content:
We have a profile on consent that is getting this error:
if identifier.system is ''urn:ietf:rfc:3986'', then the identifier.value must be a full URI (e.g. start with a scheme)
(http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/pacio-adi/qa.html#_scratch_ig-build-temp-YCC4T1_repo_fsh-generated_resources_StructureDefinition-PADI-HealthcareAgentConsent)

A issue had been previously raised here: https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179177-conformance/topic/Invalid.20Consent.20StructureDefinition.20Identifier.20Example

The IG does not add any profile examples. It is coming from the base spec. Is this something I can fix?
Nope. It's a problem with the core spec - there's an example on the resource that's invalid and there's no way to get rid inheriting it in your profile right now unfortunately.
It would be nice to suppress this error in the IG publisher @Grahame Grieve
